quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.

quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.

quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I forgot to do.
author: Unknown

quote: If at first you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.

quote: I'm on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
author: Unknown

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.

quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.

quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.

quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.

quote: Age is of no importance unless you’re a cheese.

quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.

quote: A wise man learns more from his enemies than a fool from his friends.

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.

quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.

quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire.

quote: Love recognizes no barriers.

quote: Where there is love there is laughter.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.

quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
author: Unknown

quote: My wallet is like an onion — opening it makes me cry.

quote: If life gives you lemons, add vodka.

quote: Silence is a source of great strength.

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind.

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you'll be criticized anyway.

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.

quote: Stay close to people who feel like sunshine.

quote: When you love what you have, you have everything you need.

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.

quote: I’m not great at advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?

quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.

quote: If you can’t convince them, confuse them.

quote: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.

quote: Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.

quote: Knowing what must be done does away with fear.

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

quote: Don’t tell people your plans. Show them your results.

quote: Make it happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are.

quote: Love is a choice you make from moment to moment.

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.

quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.

quote: I am on a whiskey diet. I’ve lost three days already.

quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.

quote: Don't ruin a good today by thinking about a bad yesterday.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
